Producer: Erik Bloomquist, Carson Bloomquist, Adam Weppler
Synopsis: In this satirical political slasher from the Bloomquist Brothers, a small town is shaken by a series of ominous killings in the days leading up to a heated mayoral election. As accusations fly and the threat of a masked killer darkens every street corner, the residents must race to uncover the truth before fear consumes the town.
Title: Founders Day
